reviews.review_msg: Sandie is an easygoing and super friendly prof. She is very lenient but gets stuck on certain small criteria when grading so make sure you follow the specific instructions and read the fine print. Extensions are almost always given out and the assignments themselves are all very easy. She asigns a lot of reading but never checks up on it. GPA boost

I loved this course and didn't miss one lecture. Very engaging prof that is telling you a story as he teaches, not just reading slides out to you. I found it a little difficult to keep the material organized, as it jumped from past to present within different cultural groups, but overall I highly recommend this prof and class to everyone.
